member.name: T:ImGuiNET.ColorEditFlags
member.summary: Enumeration for ColorEdit3() / ColorEdit4() / ColorPicker3() / ColorPicker4() / ColorButton()

member.name: T:ImGuiNET.ColorTarget
member.summary: Enumeration for PushStyleColor() / PopStyleColor()

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.ColorTarget.FrameBg
member.summary: Background of checkbox, radio button, plot, slider, text input

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.ColorTarget.ModalWindowDarkening
member.summary: darken entire screen when a modal window is active

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.ComboFlags.PopupAlignLeft
member.summary: Align the popup toward the left by default

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.ComboFlags.HeightSmall
member.summary: Max ~4 items visible. Tip: If you want your combo popup to be a specific size you can use SetNextWindowSizeConstraints() prior to calling BeginCombo()

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.ComboFlags.HeightRegular
member.summary: Max ~8 items visible (default)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.ComboFlags.HeightLarge
member.summary: Max ~20 items visible

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.ComboFlags.HeightLargest
member.summary: As many fitting items as possible

member.name: T:ImGuiNET.Condition
member.summary: Condition flags for ImGui::SetWindow***(), SetNextWindow***(), SetNextTreeNode***() functions. All those functions treat 0 as a shortcut to Always.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.Condition.Always
member.summary: Set the variable.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.Condition.Once
member.summary: Only set the variable on the first call per runtime session

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.Condition.FirstUseEver
member.summary: Only set the variable if the window doesn't exist in the .ini file

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.Condition.Appearing
member.summary: Only set the variable if the window is appearing after being inactive (or the first time)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DragDropFlags.SourceNoPreviewTooltip
member.summary: By default, a successful call to BeginDragDropSource opens a tooltip so you can display a preview or description of the source contents. This flag disable this behavior.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DragDropFlags.SourceNoDisableHover
member.summary: By default, when dragging we clear data so that IsItemHovered() will return true, to avoid subsequent user code submitting tooltips. This flag disable this behavior so you can still call IsItemHovered() on the source item.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DragDropFlags.SourceNoHoldToOpenOthers
member.summary: Disable the behavior that allows to open tree nodes and collapsing header by holding over them while dragging a source item.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DragDropFlags.SourceAllowNullID
member.summary: Allow items such as Text(), Image() that have no unique identifier to be used as drag source, by manufacturing a temporary identifier based on their window-relative position. This is extremely unusual within the dear imgui ecosystem and so we made it explicit.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DragDropFlags.SourceExtern
member.summary: External source (from outside of imgui), won't attempt to read current item/window info. Will always return true. Only one Extern source can be active simultaneously.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DragDropFlags.AcceptBeforeDelivery
member.summary: AcceptDragDropPayload() will returns true even before the mouse button is released. You can then call IsDelivery() to test if the payload needs to be delivered.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DragDropFlags.AcceptNoDrawDefaultRect
member.summary: Do not draw the default highlight rectangle when hovering over target.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DragDropFlags.AcceptPeekOnly
member.summary: For peeking ahead and inspecting the payload before delivery.

member.name: T:ImGuiNET.DrawCmd
member.summary: Typically, 1 command = 1 gpu draw call (unless command is a callback)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DrawCmd.ElemCount
member.summary: Number of indices (multiple of 3) to be rendered as triangles. Vertices are stored in the callee ImDrawList's vtx_buffer[] array, indices in idx_buffer[].

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DrawCmd.ClipRect
member.summary: Clipping rectangle (x1, y1, x2, y2)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DrawCmd.TextureId
member.summary: User-provided texture ID. Set by user in ImfontAtlas::SetTexID() for fonts or passed to Image*() functions. Ignore if never using images or multiple fonts atlas.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DrawCmd.UserCallback
member.summary: If != NULL, call the function instead of rendering the vertices. clip_rect and texture_id will be set normally.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DrawCmd.UserCallbackData
member.summary: The draw callback code can access this.

member.name: T:ImGuiNET.DrawData
member.summary: All draw data to render an ImGui frame

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DrawData.Valid
member.summary: Only valid after Render() is called and before the next NewFrame() is called.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DrawData.TotalVtxCount
member.summary: For convenience, sum of all cmd_lists vtx_buffer.Size

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.DrawData.TotalIdxCount
member.summary: For convenience, sum of all cmd_lists idx_buffer.Size

member.name: T:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList
member.summary: Draw command list This is the low-level list of polygons that ImGui functions are filling. At the end of the frame, all command lists are passed to your ImGuiIO::RenderDrawListFn function for rendering. At the moment, each ImGui window contains its own ImDrawList but they could potentially be merged in the future. If you want to add custom rendering within a window, you can use ImGui::GetWindowDrawList() to access the current draw list and add your own primitives. You can interleave normal ImGui:: calls and adding primitives to the current draw list. All positions are in screen coordinates (0,0=top-left, 1 pixel per unit). Primitives are always added to the list and not culled (culling is done at render time and at a higher-level by ImGui:: functions).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList.CmdBuffer
member.summary: ImVector(ImDrawCmd). Commands. Typically 1 command = 1 gpu draw call.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList.IdxBuffer
member.summary: ImVector(ImDrawIdx). Index buffer. Each command consume ImDrawCmd::ElemCount of those

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList.VtxBuffer
member.summary: ImVector(ImDrawVert)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList._OwnerName
member.summary: Pointer to owner window's name (if any) for debugging

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList._VtxCurrentIdx
member.summary: [Internal] == VtxBuffer.Size

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList._VtxWritePtr
member.summary: [Internal] point within VtxBuffer.Data after each add command (to avoid using the ImVector operators too much)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList._IdxWritePtr
member.summary: [Internal] point within IdxBuffer.Data after each add command (to avoid using the ImVector operators too much)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList._ClipRectStack
member.summary: [Internal]

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList._TextureIdStack
member.summary: [Internal]

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList._Path
member.summary: [Internal] current path building

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList._ChannelsCurrent
member.summary: [Internal] current channel number (0)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList._ChannelsCount
member.summary: [Internal] number of active channels (1+)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeDrawList._Channels
member.summary: [Internal] draw channels for columns API (not resized down so _ChannelsCount may be smaller than _Channels.Size)

member.name: T:ImGuiNET.NativeFont
member.summary: Font runtime data and rendering. ImFontAtlas automatically loads a default embedded font for you when you call GetTexDataAsAlpha8() or GetTexDataAsRGBA32().

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.FontSize
member.summary: Height of characters, set during loading (don't change after loading). Default value: [user-set]

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.Scale
member.summary: Base font scale, multiplied by the per-window font scale which you can adjust with SetFontScale() Default value: 1.0f.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.DisplayOffset
member.summary: Offset font rendering by xx pixels. Default value: (0.0f, 1.0f)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.Glyphs
member.summary: ImVector(Glyph)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.IndexXAdvance
member.summary: Sparse. Glyphs->XAdvance directly indexable (more cache-friendly that reading from Glyphs, for CalcTextSize functions which are often bottleneck in large UI).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.IndexLookup
member.summary: Sparse. Index glyphs by Unicode code-point.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.FallbackGlyph
member.summary: Equivalent to FindGlyph(FontFallbackChar)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.FallbackChar
member.summary: Replacement glyph if one isn't found. Only set via SetFallbackChar() Default value: '?'

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.ConfigData
member.summary: ImFontConfig*. Pointer within ImFontAtlas->ConfigData

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.ContainerAtlas
member.summary: ImFontAtlas*

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.Ascent
member.summary: Ascent: distance from top to bottom of e.g. 'A' [0..FontSize]

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFont.Descent
member.summary: Ascent: distance from top to bottom of e.g. 'A' [0..FontSize]

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFontAtlas.TexID
member.summary: User data to refer to the texture once it has been uploaded to user's graphic systems. It ia passed back to you during rendering.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFontAtlas.TexPixelsAlpha8
member.summary: 1 component per pixel, each component is unsigned 8-bit. Total size = TexWidth * TexHeight

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFontAtlas.TexPixelsRGBA32
member.summary: 4 component per pixel, each component is unsigned 8-bit. Total size = TexWidth * TexHeight * 4

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFontAtlas.TexWidth
member.summary: Texture width calculated during Build().

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFontAtlas.TexHeight
member.summary: Texture height calculated during Build().

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFontAtlas.TexDesiredWidth
member.summary: Texture width desired by user before Build(). Must be a power-of-two. If have many glyphs your graphics API have texture size restrictions you may want to increase texture width to decrease height.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFontAtlas.TexUvWhitePixel
member.summary: Texture coordinates to a white pixel (part of the TexExtraData block)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFontAtlas.Fonts
member.summary: (ImVector(ImFont*)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeFontAtlas.ConfigData
member.summary: ImVector(ImFontConfig). Internal data

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.FontData
member.summary: TTF data

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.FontDataSize
member.summary: TTF data size

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.FontDataOwnedByAtlas
member.summary: TTF data ownership taken by the container ImFontAtlas (will delete memory itself). Set to true.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.FontNo
member.summary: 0. Index of font within TTF file

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.SizePixels
member.summary: Size in pixels for rasterizer.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.OversampleH
member.summary: Rasterize at higher quality for sub-pixel positioning. We don't use sub-pixel positions on the Y axis. Set to 3.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.OversampleV
member.summary: Rasterize at higher quality for sub-pixel positioning. We don't use sub-pixel positions on the Y axis. Set to 1.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.PixelSnapH
member.summary: Align every character to pixel boundary (if enabled, set OversampleH/V to 1). Set to false.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.GlyphExtraSpacing
member.summary: Extra spacing (in pixels) between glyphs. Set to (0, 0).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.GlyphOffset
member.summary: Offset all glyphs from this font input. Set to (0, 0).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.GlyphRanges
member.summary: List of Unicode range (2 value per range, values are inclusive, zero-terminated list).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.MergeMode
member.summary: Merge into previous ImFont, so you can combine multiple inputs font into one ImFont (e.g. ASCII font + icons + Japanese glyphs). Set to false.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.RasterizerFlags
member.summary: Settings for custom font rasterizer (e.g. ImGuiFreeType). Leave as zero if you aren't using one. Defaults to 0.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.RasterizerMultiply
member.summary: Brighten (>1.0f) or darken (<1.0f) font output. Brightening small fonts may be a good workaround to make them more readable. Defaults to 1.0.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.Name
member.summary: [Internal Use Only] Name (strictly for debugging)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.FontConfig.DstFont
member.summary: [Internal Use Only]

member.name: M:ImGuiNET.ImGui.ScaleClipRects(ImGuiNET.DrawData*,System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Helper to scale the ClipRect field of each ImDrawCmd. Use if your final output buffer is at a different scale than ImGui expects, or if there is a difference between your window resolution and framebuffer resolution.
member.param: Pointer to the DrawData to scale.

member.summary: Contains all of the exported functions from the native (c)imGui module.

member.summary: Flags for ImGui.InputText()

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.CharsHexadecimal
member.summary: Allow 0123456789ABCDEFabcdef

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.CharsUppercase
member.summary: Turn a..z into A..Z

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.CharsNoBlank
member.summary: Filter out spaces, tabs

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.AutoSelectAll
member.summary: Select entire text when first taking mouse focus

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.EnterReturnsTrue
member.summary: Return 'true' when Enter is pressed (as opposed to when the value was modified)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.CallbackCompletion
member.summary: Call user function on pressing TAB (for completion handling)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.CallbackHistory
member.summary: Call user function on pressing Up/Down arrows (for history handling)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.CallbackAlways
member.summary: Call user function every time

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.CallbackCharFilter
member.summary: Call user function to filter character. Modify data->EventChar to replace/filter input, or return 1 to discard character.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.AllowTabInput
member.summary: Pressing TAB input a '\t' character into the text field

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.CtrlEnterForNewLine
member.summary: In multi-line mode, allow exiting edition by pressing Enter. Ctrl+Enter to add new line (by default adds new lines with Enter).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.NoHorizontalScroll
member.summary: Disable following the cursor horizontally

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.AlwaysInsertMode
member.summary: Insert mode

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.ReadOnly
member.summary: Read-only mode

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.Password
member.summary: Password mode, display all characters as '*'

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.NoUndoRedo
member.summary: Disable undo/redo. Note that input text owns the text data while active, if you want to provide your own undo/redo stack you need e.g. to call ClearActiveID().

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.InputTextFlags.Multiline
member.summary: For internal use by InputTextMultiline()

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.DisplaySize
member.summary: Display size, in pixels. For clamping windows positions. Default value: [unset]

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.DeltaTime
member.summary: Time elapsed since last frame, in seconds. Default value: 1.0f / 10.0f.

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.DisplayFramebufferScale
member.summary: For retina display or other situations where window coordinates are different from framebuffer coordinates. User storage only, presently not used by ImGui. Default value: (1.0f, 1.0f).

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.MousePosition
member.summary: Mouse position, in pixels (set to -1,-1 if no mouse / on another screen, etc.).

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.MouseWheel
member.summary: Mouse wheel: 1 unit scrolls about 5 lines text.

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.MouseDown
member.summary: Mouse buttons: left, right, middle + extras. ImGui itself mostly only uses left button (BeginPopupContext** are using right button). Others buttons allows us to track if the mouse is being used by your application + available to user as a convenience via IsMouse** API.

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.KeyMap
member.summary: Map of indices into the KeysDown[512] entries array. Default values: [unset]

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.KeysDown
member.summary: Keyboard keys that are pressed (in whatever storage order you naturally have access to keyboard data)

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.CtrlPressed
member.summary: Keyboard modifier pressed: Control.

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.ShiftPressed
member.summary: Keyboard modifier pressed: Shift

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.IO.AltPressed
member.summary: Keyboard modifier pressed: Alt

member.name: T:ImGuiNET.MouseCursorKind
member.summary: Enumeration for GetMouseCursor()

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.MouseCursorKind.TextInput
member.summary: When hovering over InputText, etc.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.MouseCursorKind.Move
member.summary: Unused

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.MouseCursorKind.ResizeNS
member.summary: Unused

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.MouseCursorKind.ResizeEW
member.summary: When hovering over a column

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.MouseCursorKind.ResizeNESW
member.summary: Unused

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.MouseCursorKind.ResizeNWSE
member.summary: When hovering over the bottom-right corner of a window

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.DisplaySize
member.summary: Display size, in pixels. For clamping windows positions. Default value: [unset]

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.DeltaTime
member.summary: Time elapsed since last frame, in seconds. Default value: 1.0f / 10.0f.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.IniSavingRate
member.summary: Maximum time between saving positions/sizes to .ini file, in seconds. Default value: 5.0f.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.IniFilename
member.summary: Path to .ini file. NULL to disable .ini saving. Default value: "imgui.ini"

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.LogFilename
member.summary: Path to .log file (default parameter to ImGui::LogToFile when no file is specified). Default value: "imgui_log.txt"

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDoubleClickTime
member.summary: Time for a double-click, in seconds. Default value: 0.30f.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDoubleClickMaxDist
member.summary: Distance threshold to stay in to validate a double-click, in pixels. Default Value: 6.0f.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDragThreshold
member.summary: Distance threshold before considering we are dragging. Default Value: 6.0f.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.KeyMap
member.summary: Map of indices into the KeysDown[512] entries array. Default values: [unset]

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.KeyRepeatDelay
member.summary: When holding a key/button, time before it starts repeating, in seconds. (for actions where 'repeat' is active). Default value: 0.250f.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.KeyRepeatRate
member.summary: When holding a key/button, rate at which it repeats, in seconds. Default value: 0.020f.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.UserData
member.summary: Store your own data for retrieval by callbacks. Default value: IntPtr.Zero.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.FontAtlas
member.summary: Load and assemble one or more fonts into a single tightly packed texture. Output to Fonts array. Default value: [auto]

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.FontGlobalScale
member.summary: Global scale all fonts. Default value: 1.0f.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.FontAllowUserScaling
member.summary: Allow user scaling text of individual window with CTRL+Wheel. Default value: false.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.FontDefault
member.summary: Font to use on NewFrame(). Use NULL to uses Fonts->Fonts[0]. Default value: null.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.DisplayFramebufferScale
member.summary: For retina display or other situations where window coordinates are different from framebuffer coordinates. User storage only, presently not used by ImGui. Default value: (1.0f, 1.0f).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.DisplayVisibleMin
member.summary: If you use DisplaySize as a virtual space larger than your screen, set DisplayVisibleMin/Max to the visible area. Default value: (0.0f, 0.0f)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.DisplayVisibleMax
member.summary: If the values are the same, we defaults to Min=0.0f) and Max=DisplaySize. Default value: (0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.OptMacOSXBehaviors
member.summary: OS X style: Text editing cursor movement using Alt instead of Ctrl, Shortcuts using Cmd/Super instead of Ctrl, Line/Text Start and End using Cmd+Arrows instead of Home/End, Double click selects by word instead of selecting whole text, Multi-selection in lists uses Cmd/Super instead of Ctrl Default value: True on OSX; false otherwise.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.OptCursorBlink
member.summary: Enable blinking cursor, for users who consider it annoying. Default value: true.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.RenderDrawListsFn
member.summary: Rendering function, will be called in Render(). Alternatively you can keep this to NULL and call GetDrawData() after Render() to get the same pointer.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.GetClipboardTextFn
member.summary: Optional: access OS clipboard (default to use native Win32 clipboard on Windows, otherwise uses a private clipboard. Override to access OS clipboard on other architectures)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.SetClipboardTextFn
member.summary: Optional: access OS clipboard (default to use native Win32 clipboard on Windows, otherwise uses a private clipboard. Override to access OS clipboard on other architectures)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MemAllocFn
member.summary: Optional: override memory allocations. MemFreeFn() may be called with a NULL pointer. (default to posix malloc/free)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MemFreeFn
member.summary: Optional: override memory allocations. MemFreeFn() may be called with a NULL pointer. (default to posix malloc/free)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.ImeSetInputScreenPosFn
member.summary: Optional: notify OS Input Method Editor of the screen position of your cursor for text input position (e.g. when using Japanese/Chinese IME in Windows) (default to use native imm32 api on Windows)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.ImeWindowHandle
member.summary: (Windows) Set this to your HWND to get automatic IME cursor positioning.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MousePos
member.summary: Mouse position, in pixels (set to -1,-1 if no mouse / on another screen, etc.).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDown
member.summary: Mouse buttons: left, right, middle + extras. ImGui itself mostly only uses left button (BeginPopupContext** are using right button). Others buttons allows us to track if the mouse is being used by your application + available to user as a convenience via IsMouse** API.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseWheel
member.summary: Mouse wheel: 1 unit scrolls about 5 lines text.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDrawCursor
member.summary: Request ImGui to draw a mouse cursor for you (if you are on a platform without a mouse cursor).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.KeyCtrl
member.summary: Keyboard modifier pressed: Control.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.KeyShift
member.summary: Keyboard modifier pressed: Shift

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.KeyAlt
member.summary: Keyboard modifier pressed: Alt

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.KeySuper
member.summary: Keyboard modifier pressed: Cmd/Super/Windows

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.KeysDown
member.summary: Keyboard keys that are pressed (in whatever storage order you naturally have access to keyboard data)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.InputCharacters
member.summary: List of characters input (translated by user from keypress+keyboard state). Fill using AddInputCharacter() helper.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.WantCaptureMouse
member.summary: Mouse is hovering a window or widget is active (= ImGui will use your mouse input).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.WantCaptureKeyboard
member.summary: Widget is active (= ImGui will use your keyboard input).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.WantTextInput
member.summary: Some text input widget is active, which will read input characters from the InputCharacters array.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.WantMoveMouse
member.summary: MousePos has been altered, back-end should reposition mouse on next frame. Set only when 'NavMovesMouse=true'.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.Framerate
member.summary: Framerate estimation, in frame per second. Rolling average estimation based on IO.DeltaTime over 120 frames.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MetricsAllocs
member.summary: Number of active memory allocations.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MetricsRenderVertices
member.summary: Vertices output during last call to Render().

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MetricsRenderIndices
member.summary: Indices output during last call to Render() = number of triangles * 3

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MetricsActiveWindows
member.summary: Number of visible windows (exclude child windows)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDelta
member.summary: Mouse delta. Note that this is zero if either current or previous position are negative, so a disappearing/reappearing mouse won't have a huge delta for one frame.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MousePosPrev
member.summary: Previous mouse position

member.summary: Position at time of clicking

member.summary: Position at time of clicking

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseClickedTime
member.summary: Time of last click (used to figure out double-click)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseClicked
member.summary: Mouse button went from !Down to Down

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDoubleClicked
member.summary: Has mouse button been double-clicked?

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseReleased
member.summary: Mouse button went from Down to !Down

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDownOwned
member.summary: Track if button was clicked inside a window. We don't request mouse capture from the application if click started outside ImGui bounds.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDownDuration
member.summary: Duration the mouse button has been down (0.0f == just clicked).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDownDurationPrev
member.summary: Previous time the mouse button has been down

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDragMaxDistanceAbs0
member.summary: Maximum distance, absolute, on each axis, of how much mouse has traveled from the clicking point

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDragMaxDistanceAbs1
member.summary: Maximum distance, absolute, on each axis, of how much mouse has traveled from the clicking point

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDragMaxDistanceAbs2
member.summary: Maximum distance, absolute, on each axis, of how much mouse has traveled from the clicking point

member.summary: Maximum distance, absolute, on each axis, of how much mouse has traveled from the clicking point

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDragMaxDistanceAbs4
member.summary: Maximum distance, absolute, on each axis, of how much mouse has traveled from the clicking point

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.MouseDragMaxDistanceSqr
member.summary: Squared maximum distance of how much mouse has traveled from the click point

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.KeysDownDuration
member.summary: Duration the keyboard key has been down (0.0f == just pressed)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeIO.KeysDownDurationPrev
member.summary: Previous duration the key has been down

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.Alpha
member.summary: Global alpha applies to everything in ImGui.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.WindowPadding
member.summary: Padding within a window.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.WindowRounding
member.summary: Radius of window corners rounding. Set to 0.0f to have rectangular windows.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.WindowBorderSize
member.summary: Thickness of border around windows. Generally set to 0.0f or 1.0f. (Other values are not well tested and more CPU/GPU costly)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.WindowMinSize
member.summary: Minimum window size.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.WindowTitleAlign
member.summary: Alignment for title bar text.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.ChildRounding
member.summary: Radius of child window corners rounding. Set to 0.0f to have rectangular windows.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.ChildBorderSize
member.summary: Thickness of border around child windows. Generally set to 0.0f or 1.0f. (Other values are not well tested and more CPU/GPU costly)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.PopupRounding
member.summary: Radius of popup window corners rounding.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.PopupBorderSize
member.summary: Thickness of border around popup windows. Generally set to 0.0f or 1.0f. (Other values are not well tested and more CPU/GPU costly)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.FramePadding
member.summary: Padding within a framed rectangle (used by most widgets).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.FrameRounding
member.summary: Radius of frame corners rounding. Set to 0.0f to have rectangular frame (used by most widgets).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.FrameBorderSize
member.summary: Thickness of border around frames. Generally set to 0.0f or 1.0f. (Other values are not well tested and more CPU/GPU costly)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.ItemSpacing
member.summary: Horizontal and vertical spacing between widgets/lines.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.ItemInnerSpacing
member.summary: Horizontal and vertical spacing between within elements of a composed widget (e.g. a slider and its label).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.TouchExtraPadding
member.summary: Expand reactive bounding box for touch-based system where touch position is not accurate enough. Unfortunately we don't sort widgets so priority on overlap will always be given to the first widget. So don't grow this too much!

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.IndentSpacing
member.summary: Horizontal indentation when e.g. entering a tree node

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.ColumnsMinSpacing
member.summary: Minimum horizontal spacing between two columns

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.ScrollbarSize
member.summary: Width of the vertical scrollbar, Height of the horizontal scrollbar

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.ScrollbarRounding
member.summary: Radius of grab corners for scrollbar

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.GrabMinSize
member.summary: Minimum width/height of a grab box for slider/scrollbar

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.GrabRounding
member.summary: Radius of grabs corners rounding. Set to 0.0f to have rectangular slider grabs.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.ButtonTextAlign
member.summary: Alignment of button text when button is larger than text. Defaults to (0.5f,0.5f) for horizontally+vertically centered.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.DisplayWindowPadding
member.summary: Window positions are clamped to be visible within the display area by at least this amount. Only covers regular windows.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.DisplaySafeAreaPadding
member.summary: If you cannot see the edge of your screen (e.g. on a TV) increase the safe area padding. Covers popups/tooltips as well regular windows.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.AntiAliasedLines
member.summary: Enable anti-aliasing on lines/borders. Disable if you are really tight on CPU/GPU.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.AntiAliasedFill
member.summary: Enable anti-aliasing on filled shapes (rounded rectangles, circles, etc.)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.NativeStyle.CurveTessellationTol
member.summary: Tessellation tolerance. Decrease for highly tessellated curves (higher quality, more polygons), increase to reduce quality.

member.name: T:ImGuiNET.SelectableFlags

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.SelectableFlags.DontClosePopups
member.summary: Clicking this doesn't close parent popup window

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.SelectableFlags.SpanAllColumns
member.summary: Selectable frame can span all columns (text will still fit in current column)

member.summary: A vector of Storage.Pair values.

member.summary: One of InputTextFlags.*. Read-only.

member.summary: What user passed to InputText(). Read-only.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TextEditCallbackData.UserData
member.summary: What user passed to InputText(). Read-only.

member.name: P:ImGuiNET.TextEditCallbackData.ReadOnly
member.summary: Read-only mode. Read-only.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TextEditCallbackData.EventChar
member.summary: Character input. Read-write (replace character or set to zero).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TextEditCallbackData.EventKey
member.summary: Key pressed (Up/Down/Tab). Read-only.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TextEditCallbackData.Buf
member.summary: Current text. Read-write (pointed data only). char* in native code.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TextEditCallbackData.BufSize
member.summary: Read-only.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TextEditCallbackData.BufDirty
member.summary: Must set if you modify Buf directly. Write-only.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TextEditCallbackData.CursorPos
member.summary: Read-write.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TextEditCallbackData.SelectionStart
member.summary: Read-write. (Equal to SelectionEnd when no selection)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TextEditCallbackData.SelectionEnd
member.summary: Read-write.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.Selected
member.summary: Draw as selected

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.Framed
member.summary: Full colored frame (e.g. for CollapsingHeader)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.AllowItemOverlap
member.summary: Hit testing to allow subsequent widgets to overlap this one

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.NoTreePushOnOpen
member.summary: Don't do a TreePush() when open (e.g. for CollapsingHeader) = no extra indent nor pushing on ID stack

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.NoAutoOpenOnLog
member.summary: Don't automatically and temporarily open node when Logging is active (by default logging will automatically open tree nodes)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.DefaultOpen
member.summary: Default node to be open

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.OpenOnDoubleClick
member.summary: Need double-click to open node

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.OpenOnArrow
member.summary: Only open when clicking on the arrow part. If ImGuiTreeNodeFlags_OpenOnDoubleClick is also set, single-click arrow or double-click all box to open.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.Leaf
member.summary: No collapsing, no arrow (use as a convenience for leaf nodes).

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.Bullet
member.summary: Display a bullet instead of arrow

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.TreeNodeFlags.FramePadding
member.summary: Use FramePadding (even for an unframed text node) to vertically align text baseline

member.name: T:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags
member.summary: Flags for ImGui::Begin()

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.NoTitleBar
member.summary: Disable title-bar

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.NoResize
member.summary: Disable user resizing with the lower-right grip

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.NoMove
member.summary: Disable user moving the window

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.NoScrollbar
member.summary: Disable scrollbar (window can still scroll with mouse or programatically)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.NoScrollWithMouse
member.summary: Disable user scrolling with mouse wheel

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.NoCollapse
member.summary: Disable user collapsing window by double-clicking on it

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.AlwaysAutoResize
member.summary: Resize every window to its content every frame

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.NoSavedSettings
member.summary: Never load/save settings in .ini file

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.NoInputs
member.summary: Disable catching mouse or keyboard inputs

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.MenuBar
member.summary: Has a menu-bar

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.HorizontalScrollbar
member.summary: Enable horizontal scrollbar (off by default). You need to use SetNextWindowContentSize(ImVec2(width,0.0f)); prior to calling Begin() to specify width.

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.NoFocusOnAppearing
member.summary: Disable taking focus when transitioning from hidden to visible state

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.NoBringToFrontOnFocus
member.summary: Disable bringing window to front when taking focus (e.g. clicking on it or programatically giving it focus)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.AlwaysUseWindowPadding
member.summary: Ensure child windows without border uses style.WindowPadding (ignored by default for non-bordered child windows, because more convenient)

member.name: F:ImGuiNET.WindowFlags.ResizeFromAnySide
member.summary: Enable resize from any corners and borders. Your back-end needs to honor the different values of io.MouseCursor set by imgui.
